title: Yacktman Sees Shining Stars in Stocks
itunes:title: Yacktman Sees Shining Stars in Stocks
description:
Brian Yacktman, Chief Investment Officer of the YCG Enhanced Fund, discusses the markets and long-term volume growth opportunities. He explains why he is investing in Mastercard and Moody's.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
